Package cn.nukkit

Class AdventureSettings

java.lang.Object
cn.nukkit.AdventureSettings
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class AdventureSettings extends Object implements Cloneable
AdventureSettings class for managing player abilities and permissions. Author: MagicDroidX (Nukkit Project)

    • onOpChange

      public void onOpChange(boolean op)
      This method will be called when the player's OP status changes. Note that this method does not send a packet to the client to refresh the privilege information, you need to manually call the update() method to do so
      Parameters:
      op - is OP or not
